profile.description: I have knowledge in BDD, Gherkin, SQL, manual and automated testing. I also use tools such as Postman, Jira, JMeter, handling concepts on the SDLC / STLC and agile methodologies. I am constantly training in new technologies that can enrich my performance. Currently I work as a QE Engineer, having the ability to lead, adapt and complement work teams. I have participated in various projects with very different approaches, such as the area of ​​​​Telecommunications, Mobile App, Insurance, e-commerce and Banking.

experience.description: I developed automated and manual software tests for telecommunications, mobile app and e-commerce projects. I led work teams and participated in the implementation of quality and continuous improvement processes.
experience.technologies: Postman, Jira, JMeter, SQL, BDD, Gherkin, SDLC/STLC, agile methodologies
